channel.title: Game crashing at Lambda Complex and XEN, and some visual artifacts
channel.description:
In this location, just before meeting team at Lambda Complex game is crashing when approaching this half open doors. It crashed game multiple times and I got through once when I was trying it going very VERY slow :laughing: ![20200411195022_1|690x388](upload://uTPPtYJCMoTjpKJZE9hmQ1iFXWD.jpeg) ![20200411195031_1|690x388](upload://xwNpZjf6iIgeMYfFCT0rEsniPaX.jpeg)
I'm experiencing crashes in XEN as well, but this time it occurs on this bridge when game reloads (after I fall off the bridge. Strangely after i killed myself using weapons It did not crash and falling off bridge after that did not crash the game) ![](upload://jVjLjqPyOLxaR3G6Y19SWkjIRKb.jpeg)
Here are all my dump files: https://www42.zippyshare.com/v/1lPZaZjc/file.html
Crashes from 11.04 are from issue in Lambda Complex and crashes from 12.04 are from XEN.
I have experienced strange visual artifacts on this bridge in XEN: ![20200412203310_1|690x388](upload://17u11PVsdHkhNiNKALs6nYueAOW.jpeg)
Here it caused bridge to be black but before crash it was strangely greenish in the same spots.
If you need more data I have game saves at these spots so i cane revisit them or provide save files.

item.title: Game crashing at Lambda Complex and XEN, and some visual artifacts
item.dc:creator: mradalbert
item.description:
Going ahead the game I have noticeg that these shadow artifacts can be spotted everywhere outside this building.

Read full topic
item.source: Game crashing at Lambda Complex and XEN, and some visual artifacts

item.title: Game crashing at Lambda Complex and XEN, and some visual artifacts
item.dc:creator: mradalbert
item.description:
I found out that it’s shadows issue. Disabling shadows in settings solves the problem (solution is a funny word in this situation xD).

Read full topic
item.source: Game crashing at Lambda Complex and XEN, and some visual artifacts

item.description:
In this location, just before meeting team at Lambda Complex game is crashing when approaching this half open doors. It crashed game multiple times and I got through once when I was trying it going very VERY slow

20200411195022_11600×900 245 KB
20200411195031_11600×900 253 KB

I’m experiencing crashes in XEN as well, but this time it occurs on this bridge when game reloads (after I fall off the bridge. Strangely after i killed myself using weapons It did not crash and falling off bridge after that did not crash the game)
